title: Why do some politicians deny climate change despite its massive projected economic costs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which massive projected economic costs for what are we discussing? Who are the politicians and what are they denying? Is there an actual discussion here, or is it a theoretical argument over sound bites and buzz phrases? Without having specifics to consider, the answer is probably limited to something like “There are a lot of reasons why.”

You are wrong from the get-go. You have absolutely no proof or shred of evidence for the theory everyone calls “Global Warming is Caused by Humans”. If you choose to believe that theory that is just fine, just don't expect me to tolerate anyone or any government dictating to me what I eat, where I live, what I drive, how I travel, or to subside anyone's else's so called “Green” purchases to cure this fraud.
